Getting Started with Research at UCLA

Created by Shannon Roux, Taylor Harper, Kian Ravaei

Affiliated with UCLA?

If you are affiliated with UCLA and would like to receive certification of completion for this workshop, be sure to Log in and Enroll in WI+RE's CCLE site before completing this workshop.

Not affiliated with UCLA?

No problem! All of our workshops and activities are open access and freely available to all! Enjoy the activities!

About this workshop
Authors

Shannon Roux, Taylor Harper, Kian Ravaei

Contributors

UCLA Undergraduate Research Center - Humanities, Arts, and Social Sciences, UCLA Undergraduate Research Center - Sciences

Learning Outcomes
  • Identify possible areas of interest for a research project
  • Find campus resources that match your needs and interests
  • Create a concrete plan with the first steps for getting involved in research
